Located in NE Uganda on the west bank of Albert Nile. Located at the end of the British railway line that ran from Mombasa (now abandon).
Murchison Falls National Park is located across the Nile from the town.

5 hour drive from Kampala.
Flights from Entebbe to Arua (2 hours drive from Pakwach) are daily with Eagle Air.
Murchison Falls National Park, Ajai Game Reserve,
Use Swamp Airboats to see wildlife on the River Nile, operated by www.bahr-el-jebel-safaris.com
River Camp 1 hour drive north of Pakwach, operated by www.bahr-el-jebel-safaris.com
